Name: Parameter
About the game: Built from the ground up for virtual reality, Parameter is a virtual reality puzzle and adventure game that pins the player in 3 diverse levels. Avoid dangerous moving teleporter traps, carefully traverse over hanging bridges and explore different detailed environments to make it to the end. Parameter features easy and smooth touchpad-based movement controls with access to level selection at any time. This game currently has limited, but not full, support for Valve Index.
